description: Fetches a list of email messages from a Gmail account, supporting filtering, pagination, and optional full content retrieval.
docstring:
Description:
    Fetches a list of email messages from a Gmail account, supporting filtering, pagination, and optional full content retrieval.
Args:
    query: Required Gmail search query (e.g., 'from:alice has:attachment').
    max_results: Optional maximum number of results to return (defaults to 20, API default 1).
    label_ids: Optional comma-separated string or iterable of label IDs to include.
    page_token: Optional pagination token from a previous response.
    include_payload: Optional flag to return full MIME payloads.
    include_spam_trash: Optional flag to include spam and trash.
    ids_only: Optional flag to return only message ids/snippets.
    verbose: Optional flag for verbose response metadata.
    user_id: Optional Gmail user identifier (defaults to 'me').
name: gmail_search

parameters.description: Optional maximum number of results to return (defaults to 20, API default 1).
parameters.name: max_results

parameters.description: Optional comma-separated string or iterable of label IDs to include.
parameters.name: label_ids

parameters.description: Optional pagination token from a previous response.
parameters.name: page_token

parameters.description: Optional flag to return full MIME payloads.
parameters.name: include_payload

parameters.description: Optional flag to include spam and trash.
parameters.name: include_spam_trash

parameters.description: Optional flag to return only message ids/snippets.
parameters.name: ids_only

parameters.description: Optional flag for verbose response metadata.
parameters.name: verbose

python_signature: gmail_search(self, query: str, max_results: int = 20, *, label_ids: typing.Any | None = None, page_token: str | None = None, include_payload: bool | None = None, include_spam_trash: bool | None = None, ids_only: bool | None = None, verbose: bool | None = None, user_id: str = 'me')
short_description: Fetches a list of email messages from a Gmail account, supporting filtering, pagination, and optional full content retrieval
